name: Cusano - P1 Bundle - 606
additionalNotes: Davidoff offers you the Cusano P1 Bundle cigars. Dressed in dark and oily Connecticut Broadleaf wrappers, these expertly crafted smokes provide the maduro lover with rich flavors of chocolate, cedar, sweet spice, and creamy caramel. Along with great taste, Cusano P1 will impress everyone with its outstanding construction and great burn.
